content: Turning to the quarter for the 3 months ended September 30, 2022, our revenues were $409,000 compared to $654,000 for the same period in 2021. In addition to achieving faster time to market and lower development costs as a result of our asset-light model, we also expect to achieve lower production and BOM or bill of materials costs compared to our Gen 3 vehicles by utilizing standardized processes and procedures and better use of our components and subassemblies.
